exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the term "n" leads to a term fun n0 : nat => forall H0 : ak * ak <> n0, m <> n0 -> (exists q : Z_Zp (ak * ak), Zp_invertible H0 q /\\ nat2Zp H0 am = Zp_mult H0 (Zp_mult H0 q (nat2Zp H0 l)) (nat2Zp H0 ak)) -> ak <> n0 -> False which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "Zp_invertible" of type "forall p : nat, p <> 0 -> Z_Zp p -> Prop" cannot be applied to the terms "ak * ak" : "nat" "H0" : "ak * ak <> n0" "q" : "Z_Zp (ak * ak)" The 2nd term has type "ak * ak <> n0" which should be coercible to "ak * ak <> 0".

original: intros. intros H_contra. simpl in H_contra. destruct H_contra.
